mapper.sql: id, eunm_code, code, name, validate_flag, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_enumerate_detailed
id,
eunm_code,
code,
name,
validate_flag,
create_time,
create_user,
update_time,
update_user,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{eunmCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{validateFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT t2.id, t2.eunm_code, t2.code, t2.name, t2.validate_flag, t2.create_time, t2.create_user, t2.update_time, t2.update_user FROM sys_enumerate t1 LEFT JOIN sys_enumerate_detailed t2 ON t1.enum_code = t2.eunm_code AND t2.validate_flag = 'Y' WHERE t1.validate_flag = 'Y'
AND t1.enum_code = #{enumCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
